mentions.context: Figure 5 shows a running simulation of the same model, implemented in the GAMA platform.
In order to make a graphical representation of the argument network, we used the visualization program Yed Graph Editor (version 3.17.1).
The model introduced was built and run on two different agent-based modelling and simulation platforms, namely CORMAS and GAMA (Taillandier et al., 2018).
